item.title: Late Holocene Records of Changing Moisture Regime from Wetlands in Southwestern Nova Scotia, Canada: Implications for Wetland Conservation and Restoration
A paleolimnological archive of metal sequestration and release in the Cumberland Basin Marshes, Atlantic Canada
A 10 000 year record of environmental change at Long Lake, Cumberland Marshes, Nova Scotia-New Brunswick border region, Canada
